org.apache.solr.index

Class SimpleMergePolicyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.index.MergePolicyFactory
      • org.apache.solr.index.SimpleMergePolicyFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogByteSizeMergePolicyFactory, LogDocMergePolicyFactory, TieredMergePolicyFactory

    public abstract class SimpleMergePolicyFactory
extends MergePolicyFactory
    A MergePolicyFactory for simple MergePolicy objects. Implementations need only create the policy instance and this class will then configure it with all set properties.
